name: VNPoint
desc: An immutable object that represents a single, two-dimensional point in an image.

items.name: init(x: Double, y: Double)
items.desc: Creates a point object with the specified coordinates.

items.name: init(location: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a point object from the specified Core Graphics point.

items.name: class func apply(VNVector, to: VNPoint) -> VNPoint
items.desc: Creates a point object thatâ€™s shifted by the X and Y offsets of the specified vector.

items.name: class var zero: VNPoint
items.desc: A point object that represents the origin.

items.name: var location: CGPoint
items.desc: The Core Graphics point for this point.

items.name: func distance(VNPoint) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the distance to another point.
